ValidationRule.description: Billing country should be Canada and shipping state should valid two letter province codes by Canada Post
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( BillingCountry = "CA", BillingCountry="CAN", BillingCountry="CANADA", BillingCountry="Canada", BillingCountry="canada", BillingCountry="ca", BillingCountry="Ca", BillingCountry="can", BillingCountry="Can"), OR( LEN( BillingState ) < 2, NOT( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NT:NS:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT", BillingState) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Billing State must be valid two letter province codes by Canada Post
